a.span: Parent/Guardian/Community Letter - School Closure Extended Through April 24th - 4/7/2020
Parent/Guardian/Community Letter - Student Attendance & Technology Concerns - 4/1/2020

p.span: To families of Laurel Public Schools: Food Box Request Form

strong.span: School closure has been extended through April 10, 2020.
Student device checkout is complete. If your student is still in need of a device to access online learning, please call 406-628-3314 to schedule an appointment.

br.strong: Update 3/15/2020: Governor Bullock has directed the closure of all Montana public K-12 schools from March 16 through March 27. More information will be provided tomorrow on meal availability and medication pickup. Please continue to practice social distancing and best practices to prevent the spread of this virus.

a.span: Riverstone Health Illness Policy - When to Keep Students Home
What to do if you are sick with COVID-19

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,

p.em: Dedicated to the individual development of each student, every day, without exception.
